description: The fastest way to use AI powered by ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini anywhere. The only generative AI extension you need.
name: MaxAI.me: Use 1-Click AI Anywhere

settings.sign_in__description: Please sign in to manage your settings and create custom prompts
settings.sync__different_settings__description: We found different settings (including your custom prompts if any) on your local browser and online account. Your online account settings have overridden your local browser settings. If you prefer to keep your local browser settings instead, click the "Keep local browser settings" button now.
settings.sync__different_settings__chose_local_or: Be aware that you will lose your local browser settings permanently by keeping your online account settings and cannot be undone.
settings.sync__different_settings__keep_local_but: Are you sure you want to replace your online account settings with your local browser settings (including your custom prompts if any)? Doing so will undo your online account settings permanently and cannot be undone.
settings.feature_card__prompts__place_my_own_prom: Place my own prompts at the top
settings.feature_card__prompts__edit_prompt__fiel: The prompt will be directly sent to AI, which is the default "normal behavior". All prompt templates will have this option enabled by default.
The prompt first goes to the input box, allowing you to modify or add additional information before sending it to AI.
settings.feature_card__prompts__edit_prompt__mock: Ask AI to edit or generate...
settings.feature_card__prompts__help__manage_your: Create prompt groups for nested menus
Rearrange prompts and groups via drag and drop
settings.feature_card__prompts__prompt_template__: When you use this variable in the prompt template, it will display the incoming email that needs a response.
When you use this variable in the prompt template, it will display the current draft present in the Gmail text box.
settings.feature_card__prompts__confirm__delete__: Are you sure you want to delete this prompt? Please note that once you delete it, the action cannot be undone.
Are you sure you want to delete this prompt group? Please note that once you delete it, all the prompts under this prompt group will also be deleted, and the action cannot be undone.
settings.feature_card__prompts__confirm__delete_a: Are you sure you want to delete all your prompts and prompt groups? Please note that once you proceed, the action cannot be undone.
settings.feature_card__prompts__confirm__restore_: Are you sure you want to restore all your prompts and prompt groups to this version? Please note that once you proceed, the action cannot be undone.
settings.feature_card__prompts__restore__dialog__: Restore your prompts from a previous version
Restore your prompts and prompt groups from a previous version, or delete all.
settings.feature_card__openai_api_key__help__obta: Sign in to your OpenAI account. If you do not have an account,
Click 'Create new secret key' and copy & paste it into the "API key" input field on the left
settings.feature_card__openai_api_key__discover_a: Discover active models for your API key
settings.feature_card__openai_api_key__help__disc: Click "Model" to view all models activated for your API key
settings.feature_card__openai_api_key__check_cred: Check your OpenAI API usage and credit
settings.feature_card__openai_api_key__help__chec: Check your API usage and credit breakdown
settings.feature_card__openai_api_key__protips__i: OpenAI API is more stable than the ChatGPT free plan.
Be aware of potential usage-based fees from OpenAI.
Your API Key is securely stored in your browser, never shared elsewhere.
Expect potential usage instability during peak demand times with free OpenAI API key.
settings.feature_card__shortcut_hint__field_edit_: If the settings page for shortcuts indicates that the Cmd/Alt+J shortcut has already been set for MaxAI.me extension, please perform a force reconfiguration of the Cmd/Alt+J shortcut as instructed in the video.
settings.feature_card__appearance__field_pdf_view: Ability to select text in any PDF files and use prompts on them.
Enhanced PDF viewer features compared to the browser's built-in viewer.
Our PDF AI viewer only works with local PDF files at the moment.
Support for online PDF files is coming soon.
How to activate the extension on PDF file
Step 1: Open PDF file in browser
Step 2: Enable "PDF AI viewer" in extension settings
Step 3: Enable "Allow access to file URLs" in Chrome settings
Step 4: Re-open PDF in browser to use prompt on selected text
Protip: Make sure to enable both "PDF AI viewer" and "Allow access to file URLs" to activate the extension on PDF file
settings.feature_card__preferred_language__field_: Choose your preferred language of the extension's user interface
View all interface text in your chosen language.
settings.feature_card__ai_response_language__fiel: Choose the default language for Al response
When "Auto" is selected, Al will respond in the same language variety or dialect as the selected text.
settings.feature_card__chatgpt_stable_mode__field: Set how long Stable Mode stays on after activation
Stable Mode will be disabled in
settings.feature_card__chatgpt_stable_mode__proti: ChatGPT stable mode is a feature that reduces ChatGPT interruptions and network errors.
settings.feature_card__perks__one_click_prompts__: Turn hours-long tasks into minutes using our expanding collection of prompts for marketing, sales, copywriting, operation, productivity, and customer support.
settings.feature_card__perks__rewards__card_title: Get Fast Text Queries for free!
settings.feature_card__perks__rewards__card_descr: Invite your friends to join MaxAI.me! For anyone who signs up using your referral link and installs MaxAI.me extension, we'll give you both 100 Fast Text Queries for free! To get unlimited queries and unlock all premium features,
settings.visibility_card__black_list_description: List of websites that have the mini menu hidden when selecting text.
settings.visibility_card__white_list_description: The prompt will only appear on the enabled sites. If no enabled sites are added, the prompt will be visible on all sites.
settings.feature__search_with_ai__title: Display AI responses next to search results
settings.feature__search_with_ai__trigger_mode__a: Display AI response for every search.
settings.feature__search_with_ai__trigger_mode__q: Display AI response whenever your search query ends with a question mark.
settings.feature__search_with_ai__trigger_mode__m: Display AI response only when you click a button manually.

client.provider__bard_web_app__model__what_it_c: Reasoning, multilingual translation, coding, and more.

client.provider__claude_web_app__auth_descripti: Use your own Claude account to power the extension.
client.provider__claude_web_app__upload__accept: Add files (5 max, 10MB each). Accepts pdf, txt, csv, etc.
client.provider__claude_web_app__model__claude_: Superior performance on tasks that require complex reasoning. Claude 2 is Anthropic's best-in-class offering.
client.provider__chatgpt_web_app__short_descrip: GPT-4, Web Browsing, Code Interpreter, and Plugins via ChatGPT Plus.
client.provider__chatgpt_web_app__auth_descript: Use your own ChatGPT account to power the extension.
client.provider__chatgpt_web_app__stable_mode_t: If experiencing frequent interruptions and network errors, try
client.provider__chatgpt_web_app__waiting_toolt: If connection takes more than 10 seconds,
client.provider__chatgpt_web_app__text_davinci_: OpenAI's fastest model, great for most everyday tasks.
client.provider__chatgpt_web_app__gpt_4__descri: OpenAI's most capable model, great for tasks that require creativity and advanced reasoning.
client.provider__chatgpt_web_app__gpt_4_code_in:
An experimental model that can solve tasks by generating Python code and executing it in a Jupyter notebook.
You can upload any kind of file, and ask model to analyse it, or produce a new file which you can download.
client.provider__chatgpt_web_app__gpt_4_plugins: An experimental model that knows when and how to use plugins
client.provider__openai_api__auth_description: Use your own OpenAl API key to power the extension.
client.provider__openai_api__model__gpt_3_5__de: OpenAI's most capable GPT-3.5 model and optimized for chat at 1/10th the cost of text-davinci-003.  Will be updated with OpenAI's latest model iteration 2 weeks after it is released.
client.provider__openai_api__model__gpt_3_5_16k: Same capabilities as the standard gpt-3.5-turbo model but with 4 times the context.
client.provider__openai_api__model__gpt_4__desc: More capable than any GPT-3.5 model, able to do more complex tasks, and optimized for chat. Will be updated with OpenAI's latest model iteration 2 weeks after it is released.
client.provider__openai_api__model__gpt_4_32k__: Same capabilities as the base gpt-4 mode but with 4x the context length. Will be updated with our latest model iteration.
client.provider__openai_api__model__gpt_3_5_110: The latest GPT-3.5 Turbo model with improved instruction following, JSON mode, reproducible outputs, parallel function calling, and more. Returns a maximum of 4,096 output tokens.
client.provider__openai_api__model__gpt_4_0613_: Snapshot of gpt-4 from June 13th 2023 with function calling data. Unlike gpt-4, this model will not receive updates, and will be deprecated 3 months after a new version is released.
Snapshot of gpt-4-32 from June 13th 2023. Unlike gpt-4-32k, this model will not receive updates, and will be deprecated 3 months after a new version is released.
client.provider__openai_api__model__gpt_4_1106_: The latest GPT-4 Turbo model, enhanced for speed and efficiency, features advanced instruction following tailored for rapid response. It includes an optimized JSON mode for structured data handling, ensures consistent and reproducible outputs, and supports parallel function calling for multitasking efficiency. This model maintains a maximum output of 4,096 tokens, balancing comprehensive responses with streamlined performance.
client.provider__openai_api__model__gpt_4_visio: Ability to understand images, in addition to all other GPT-4 Turbo capabilties. Returns a maximum of 4,096 output tokens. This is a preview model version and not suited yet for production traffic.
client.provider__chatgpt__short_description: As fast as ChatGPT Plus. GPT-3.5-turbo, GPT-4-turbo, and GPT-3.5-turbo-16k.
client.provider__chatgpt__auth_description: Use ChatGPT to power the extension.
client.provider__chatgpt__model__gpt_3_5__descr: OpenAI's fastest model, great for most everyday tasks.
client.provider__chatgpt__model__gpt_3_5_16k__d: Same capabilities as the standard gpt-3.5-turbo model but with 4 times the context.
client.provider__chatgpt__model__gpt_4__descrip: OpenAI's most capable model, great for tasks that require creativity and advanced reasoning.
client.provider__chatgpt__model__gpt_4_vision__: Also known as GPT-4 with Vision, or GPT-4V, represents OpenAI's most advanced iteration yet, combining robust image processing capabilities with the latest GPT-4 Turbo model, enabling it to interpret and respond to visual inputs in tandem with text.
client.provider__chatgpt__upload__accept_docs_a: Upload docs or images to MaxAI
client.provider__chatgpt__upload_file_error__to: The file uploaded is too large. Consider using an AI model with a larger context window, or uploading a file of a smaller size.
client.provider__poe__short_description: Access Claude beyond the US and UK.
client.provider__poe__auth_description: Use your own Poe to power the extension.
client.provider__poe__model__a2__description: Anthropicâ€™s fastest model, with strength in creative tasks. Features a context window of 9k tokens (around 7,000 words).
client.provider__poe__model__a2_2__description: Anthropic's most powerful model. Particularly good at creative writing.
client.provider__poe__model__a2_100k__descripti: Anthropicâ€™s fastest model, with an increased context window of 100k tokens (around 75,000 words). Enables analysis of very long documents, code, and more. Since this is an experimental early access model, usage is currently limited to 100 messages per month for Poe subscribers (subject to change).
client.provider__claude__auth_description: Use Claude to power the extension.
client.provider__claude__model__claude_instant_: Anthropic's fastest model, 100K context window, great for very long document and code analysis, summarization, and comprehension.
client.provider__claude__model__claude_2_100k__: Anthropic's most powerful model, 100K context window, great for tasks ranging from sophisticated dialogue and creative content generation to detailed instruction.
client.provider__claude__model__claude_2_1_200k: The latest offering from Anthropic, Claude 2.1, boasts a 200K token context window and notably reduced hallucination rates, making it highly effective for precise analysis and summarization of extensive documents.
client.provider__claude__model__claude_3_haiku_: Anthropic's fastest model in its intelligence class, Haiku is a versatile solution for a wide range of everyday tasks.
client.provider__claude__model__claude_3_sonnet: Claude-3-Sonnet strikes a balance between intelligence and speed. Perfect for tasks demanding both precision and speed, such as data processing, sales optimization, code generation, and more.
client.provider__claude__model__claude_3_opus__: Anthropic's most intelligent model, with best-in-market performance on highly complex tasks. It can navigate open-ended prompts and sight-unseen scenarios with remarkable fluency and human-like understanding, showing us the outer limits of what's possible with generative AI.
client.provider__gemini__short_description: Google's most capable and general model, built from the ground up for multimodality. Gemini on MaxAI currently supports text and code and will soon add support for images, videos, and audio.
client.provider__gemini__auth_description: Use Gemini to power the extension.
client.provider__gemini__model__gemini_pro__des: Google's Gemini family, designed to offer scalability and exhibits strong generalist capabilities, supporting 38 languages and a context window of 32k tokens.
client.provider__gemini__model__gemini_1_5_pro_: Gemini 1.5 is Google's next-generation model offering enhanced performance, an efficient MoE architecture, and a breakthrough in long-context understanding with up to 1 million token windows, enabling advanced capabilities across text, code, image, audio, and video processing.
client.provider__free_ai__short_description: Designed for basic usage, it offers key features but does not encompass the extensive versatility and advanced capabilities of our Pro/Elite models. Ideal for newcomers exploring MaxAI features or for casual applications.
client.provider__free_ai__auth_description: FreeAI provides fundamental functionalities similar to other LLMs.
client.provider__free_ai__model__special__descr: Free AI provides basic, no-cost access to AI productivity tools, perfect for light or trial use. It lets you test MaxAI's basic features, with an easy upgrade path to the full, advanced MaxAI suite. We aim to improve Free AI continuously, reducing the difference between our free and premium AI options.
client.provider__free_ai__model__mistral_7b_ins: Mistral-7B-Instruct: Surpassing Llama 2 13B in efficiency, this 7.3B parameter model excels in all benchmarks, optimized for rapid response and extended context understanding.
client.provider__free_ai__model__openchat_7b__d: This model integrates OpenChat's open-source language capabilities, refined with Conditioned Reinforcement Learning Fine-Tuning, and trained on diverse data sets for nuanced understanding.
client.provider__free_ai__model__mythomist_7b__: A Fusion of Excellence â€“ Crafted by the creator of MythoMax, this model amalgamates Neural Chat 7B, Airoboros 7B, Toppy M 7B, Zepher 7B Beta, Nous Capybara 34B, OpenHeremes 2.5, and more, to enhance ChatGPT roleplaying by reducing word anticipation, ministrations, and other undesirable elements.
client.provider__third_party_confirm_dialog__su: Use your own AI provider to power the extension.
client.provider__third_party_confirm_dialog__im: Please be aware that as this third-party provider evolves, you may occasionally experience bugs or slower responses, which are beyond MaxAI's control. We're actively working to minimize these issues and value your understanding.
client.provider__third_party_confirm_dialog__ou: We highly recommend choosing the premium AI models managed by MaxAI to ensure reliable and high-quality AI performance and user experience:
client.provider__third_party_confirm_dialog__yo: Share any feedback or ideas you have â€“ it helps us improve.

prompt_editor.preset_variables__help__description: You can use any or none of these ready-to-use variables in your template:
prompt_editor.preset_variables__help__live_crawling__d:
By using these variables, the text will be crawled from the given website link {{LIVE_CRAWLING_TARGET_URL}}.
The {{LIVE_CRAWLING_CRAWLED_TEXT}} will then show this crawled text.
prompt_editor.preset_variables__help__web_search__desc:
When you use these variables, the system will search for {{WEB_SEARCH_QUERY}}.
Then, {{WEB_SEARCH_RESULTS}} will show these search results.
prompt_editor.preset_variables__help__system__descript:
{{SELECTED_TEXT}} will be replaced with the text you selected on the current page.
{{CURRENT_WEBSITE_DOMAIN}}will be replaced with the current website's domain.
{{SYSTEM_CURRENT_DATE}} will show today's date.
More "Context" variables might be added later.
prompt_editor.preset_variables__system__selected_text_: the text you selected on the current page
write a better version of the follow text: {{SELECTED_TEXT}}
translate the following text to English: {{SELECTED_TEXT}}
prompt_editor.preset_variables__system__ai_response_la:
This prompt template variable will be replaced with the "AI output language" selected on the Settings page.
If uncertain of the "Settings" page location, simply click the "Settings" icon found in the top bar within the side bar.
you will reply with ideas in {{AI_RESPONSE_LANGUAGE}}
prompt_editor.preset_variables__system__current_websit: reply to the following text on {{CURRENT_WEBSITE_DOMAIN}}
note that the text is from {{CURRENT_WEBSITE_DOMAIN}}
prompt_editor.preset_variables__web_search__web_search: what the system will search for (ex: apple 15 price)
prompt_editor.preset_variables__live_crawling__live_cr: the given website link to be crawled
the text that will be shown after crawling {{LIVE_CRAWLING_TARGET_URL}}

quota_usage_card.advanced_text__secondary__content__toolt: Ensure at least 1,500 high-speed advanced text queries each month. After reaching the limit, the speed and quality of the model may be reduced.
